About Me

Here are some few things about me.

April Anne Gaza Brabante

Hello there I'm April! A full stack developer currently residing in the Philippines. Aside from being a developer, I am a person who enjoys music a lot. Sometimes I practice playing guitar and yukelele. I am outgoing person and loves to hang out and organized event if I have free time. I am a competitive person and believe in the old adage that humans should thrive and not just survive. In my free time, I do love to exercise and play with my cats. I graduated Bachelor of Science in Computer Science last 2006-2010 at Palawan State University.

STI Palawan

Instructor

I have been an IT Instructor for 8 months. I teached basic microsoft office for the freshmans as well as basic programming language such as Java and C. I also teached my students about the fundamentals of HTML.

Teleserv

Call Center Agent

I used to work as a agent for almost 4 months. My account was under TM, a sim card here in the Philippines. My tasks is to answer some queries and do some troubleshoot for our client.

SDMI(SHI Designing and Manufacturing Inc.)

Full Stack Developer

I've been a full stack developer for almost decade now. I've handle many programming lanuage such as Java, Python, VBA, Visual Basic, and Oracle Developer. Most of our tasks is to maintain the system, as well as conduct some version up if needed. Im currently in the research group now wherein we have to some investigation in our framewok if needed.
